publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4297.1 Mr Jamie Stone: Promoting Doricâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4297) in the name of Ms Maureen Watt, leave out from "to actively" to end and insert "actively to encourage and promote Doric and all the other local variants of Scots, such as that spoken in Caithness, which together add much to the linguistic richness and diversity of Scotland."
S2M-4297.1 Promoting Doric (lodged on 5 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
